Repro steps:
1) Right-click on the Tables folder of a connection in offline mode int he 
Database Explorer and select Filter...
2) Modify the filter and click Finish.

Actual result:  Nothing happens.  The filter is not applied and the dialog is 
not dismissed.  An exception is thrown and visible in the error log.

java.lang.ClassCastException
at org.eclipse.wst.rdb.connection.internal.ui.filter.FilterWizard.performFinish
(FilterWizard.java:105)
...

Expected result:  The Filter... menu item should not be available when a 
connection is in offline mode.

In the interest of bugzilla bookkeeping, I'm marking all the old RBD bugs as "won't fix" since no further maintenance is planned for that component. 

If you still have some issues with database tools I suggest you use and open bugs against the Eclipse DTP Project. 

We do appreciate you helping us by opening the bug, though, and apologize it was not able to be resolved in a better and more timely manner.
